title: Congratulating the Chazy Boys Varsity Soccer Team upon the occasion of winning the Class D Championship
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION congratulating the Chazy Boys Varsity Soccer Team
and  Coach Rob McAuliffe upon the occasion of winning the New York State
Public High School Athletic Association Class D Championship

WHEREAS, Excellence and success in competitive sports  can  be  achieved
only  through strenuous practice, team play and team spirit, nurtured by
dedicated coaching and strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling in them the value of  teamwork,  encouraging  a  standard  of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play and competition; and
  WHEREAS,  The  Chazy  Boys  Varsity Soccer Team are the New York State
Public High School Athletic Association Class D Champions; the defending
state champions and top ranked  Eagles  defeated  the  Hamilton  Emerald
Knights by a score of 1-0; and
  WHEREAS,  The  athletic  talent displayed by this team is due in great
part to the efforts of Coach Rob McAuliffe and his team  of  outstanding
assistant coaches, skilled and inspirational tutors, respected for their
ability to develop potential into excellence; and
  WHEREAS,  The  team's  overall  record of 21-1 is outstanding, and the
team members were loyally  and  enthusiastically  supported  by  family,
fans, friends and the community at large; and
  WHEREAS, The hallmarks of the Chazy Boys Varsity Soccer Team, from the
opening  game of the season to participation in the Championship, were a
brotherhood of athletic ability, of good sportsmanship, of honor and  of
scholarship,  demonstrating  that these team players are second to none;
and
  WHEREAS, Athletically and academically, the team members  have  proven
themselves to be an unbeatable combination of talents, reflecting favor-
ably on their school; and
  WHEREAS,  Coach  Rob  McAuliffe  and  his  dedicated staff have done a
superb job in guiding, molding and inspiring  the  team  members  toward
their goals; and
  WHEREAS, Sports competition instills the values of teamwork, pride and
accomplishment,  and  Coach  Rob  McAuliffe and his outstanding athletes
have clearly made a contribution to the spirit of excellence which is  a
tradition of their school; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
congratulate the Chazy Boys Varsity Soccer Team; its members: Cole Chas-
key, Kyle McCarthy, Cody Toohill, Jordan Barriere, Kaleb  Snide,  Hunter
Dominy,  Andrew  Rabideau,  Craig  Botten,  Nelson  Pelton, Ricky Osier,
Nathan Reynolds, Matt Gravelle, Alex Sweet, Andrew Duprey, Hayden  Guay,
Jeffrey Botten, John Tregan, Nolan Rogers, Brandon Laurin, Michael Ryba,
Austin  Santor,  and  Brett  Giroux,  and  Coaches Rob McAuliffe, Gaelan
Trombley, and Jacob Spiegel on their outstanding season and overall team
record; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Chazy Boys Varsity Soccer Team and to the  aforementioned
coaches.
